name: Roy Tang
text: According to Google Translate:  bitter -> mapait, maasim, masaklap, mapakla, maanghang, masakit  tart -> maasim, maaskad, mahayap  acrid -> maaskad, mapakla, makahat    mapait -> bitter, nasty  maasim -> sour, bitter, tart, acid, acerbic, acetous  masaklap -> bitter, harshly bitter  mapakla -> acrid, bitter    From some random English->Tagalo g dictionary online:  bitter adj. 1 mapait 2 sour, such as vinegar, lemon juice, etc: maasim 3 acrid, tart: mapakla 4 pungent: maanghang 5 bitter feeling, resent- ment, hurt: malaking sama ng loob, galit, hinanakit    I guess mapait and mapakla don't map cleanly to English

source_obj.text: According to Google Translate:  bitter -> mapait, maasim, masaklap, mapakla, maanghang, masakit  tart -> maasim, maaskad, mahayap  acrid -> maaskad, mapakla, makahat    mapait -> bitter, nasty  maasim -> sour, bitter, tart, acid, acerbic, acetous  masaklap -> bitter, harshly bitter  mapakla -> acrid, bitter    From some random English->Tagalo g dictionary online:  bitter adj. 1 mapait 2 sour, such as vinegar, lemon juice, etc: maasim 3 acrid, tart: mapakla 4 pungent: maanghang 5 bitter feeling, resent- ment, hurt: malaking sama ng loob, galit, hinanakit    I guess mapait and mapakla don't map cleanly to English
